adHeader: Fine Gardening and Landscapes by Thomas Seiler
adDetails: Offering fine gardening and landscapes Specializing in organic techniques, non-toxic pest control, installations, irrigation systems, vegetable gardens (both installation & maintenance), Installations: Lawns Vegetable gardens Irrigation systems Fruit trees Native and drought-tolerant plants Rock work Privacy hedges and barriers Maintenance Services: Tree pruning (both ornamental & fruit) I specialize in Japanese Maples Fertilizing specializing in organics General clean-up and maintenance Ã¼Background / Qualifications I have local clients that I have been servicing for 20 years. For 3 years I worked as a gardener's apprentice in Japan in the early '90s. References References upon request.
